name: chrysalis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a moth or butterfly at the stage of development when it is covered by a hard case, before it becomes an adult insect with wings, or the case itself Compare
pupa

an insect at the stage of development when it is like a worm protected by a hard cover, before it becomes a moth or butterfly
